name: LeftRight (coreanodecalle)
description:
Test your reflexes in this fast-paced colorful reaction game. Simply make a choice depending on the colored ball and quickly select Left or Right so it can go through the similar color bars on the sides of the screen… Left or right, easy.

With more correct choices the game gets harder… how long can you endure?

Instructions:

Touch the left or right on-screen arrows to rotate the center bar and make the ball bounce to that direction (alternatively, press the left or right arrows in your keyboard).

Make the ball bounce to the wrong side and it’s game over!!
